programme.title: BBC News at One

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: Men in Black...Men in Black...(1997) Sci-fi comedy with Tommy Lee Jones and Will Smith as the titular heroes - agents who regulate the aliens who have settled on Earth, ensuring they remain undetected [imdb description: Directed by Barry Sonnenfeld. With Tommy Lee Jones, Will Smith, Linda Fiorentino, Vincent D'Onofrio. A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extra terrestrial interactions on planet earth.] [imdb description: Directed by Barry Sonnenfeld. With Tommy Lee Jones, Will Smith, Linda Fiorentino, Vincent D'Onofrio. A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extra terrestrial interactions on planet earth.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Smart, funny spoof that is impossible not to like! ... Fun, memorable sci-fi comedy has lots of personality thanks to director, composer, and two lead actors. ... One of the best sci-fi comedies ever made. ... Funny Sci-Fi. As Good As Ghostbusters. ... Men in Black: The Galaxy Defenders

In 1933 New York, an overly ambitious movie producer coerces his cast and hired ship crew to travel to mysterious Skull Island, where they encounter Kong, a giant ape who is immediately smitten with leading lady Ann Darrow.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : A 10-star 2-hour movie screaming to get out of a 7-star 3-hour movie ... Truly A Masterpiece! ... Too much, too long, too bad ... Wow ... A roaring success

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk
programme.desc: The Incredible Hulk...Bruce Banner's attempts to deal with his explosive anger issues are complicated when soldier Emil Blonsky undergoes a similar transformation. With Ed Norton and Liv Tyler. (2008) [imdb description: Directed by Louis Leterrier. With Edward Norton, Liv Tyler, Tim Roth, William Hurt. Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he emerges whenever he loses his temper. However, Banner then must fight a soldier whom unleashes himself as a threat stronger than he.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Attention - Origin Mixture!!! ... A whole lot better than you think ... Finally a bit of meat and potato's to go with my green eggs and ham... ... programme.review: Viewers comments : A very relevant movie for me ... P.S. Move On ... Total tearjerker falsely billed as a romantic comedy ... Great Movie, Must See Romantic Comedy. ... An overall enjoyable chick flick and good date movie

programme.title: Vanity Fair

(2004) [imdb description: Directed by Mira Nair. With Reese Witherspoon, Romola Garai, James Purefoy, Jonathan Rhys Meyers. Growing up poor in London, Becky Sharp (Witherspoon) defies her poverty-stricken background and ascends the social ladder alongside her best friend, Amelia.] [imdb description: Directed by Mira Nair. With Reese Witherspoon, Romola Garai, James Purefoy, Jonathan Rhys Meyers. Growing up poor in London, Becky Sharp (Witherspoon) defies her poverty-stricken background and ascends the social ladder alongside her best friend, Amelia.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : A novel without a hero becomes a film without any bite ... Great film, if you haven't read the book ... Vanity Fair without the Vanita, Vanitatas ... Thackery goes Hollywood ... Disappointing, if not disastrous

programme.title: Accidental Husband
programme.desc: The Accidental Husband...Colin Firth and Uma Thurman star in this rom-com about a jilted boyfriend who sets about getting revenge on the talk radio host who advised his girlfriend to split up with him. When talk radio host Emma Lloyd advises one of her listeners to break up with her boyfriend, the jilted ex sets about getting his revenge.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : disappointing ... Rather forgettable ... Incoherent, Implausible and Silly ... Alternative title - "The Lucky Escapes!" ... Wasted talent on a plot that strains credulity

programme.title: Another Cinderella Story
programme.desc: Another Cinderella Story...Musical starring Selena Gomez and Andrew Seeley. A young man stages a dancing competition to reacquaint himself with the mysterious girl of his dreams. (2008) [imdb description: Directed by Damon Santostefano. With Selena Gomez, Drew Seeley, Jane Lynch, Katharine Isabelle. A guy who danced with what could be the girl of his dreams at a costume ball only has one hint at her identity: the Zune she left behind as she rushed home in order to make her curfew. And with a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity in front of him, he sets out to find his masked beauty.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Not As Bas As It Looks... ... Good overall. ... great movie for tweens ... Delightfully Silly and Enjoyable ... A New and refreshing retelling of an old Classic!!!

programme.title: Alvin & the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked
programme.desc: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked...Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked...Animated comedy sequel starring Jason Lee and David Cross. The Chipmunks and Chipettes go overboard during a cruise ship holiday and are washed up on a tropical island. (2011) [imdb description: Directed by Mike Mitchell. With Justin Long, Jesse McCartney, Jason Lee, David Cross. Playing around while aboard a cruise ship, the Chipmunks and Chipettes accidentally go overboard and end up marooned in a tropical paradise. They discover their new turf is not as deserted as it seems.] [imdb description: Directed by Mike Mitchell. With Justin Long, Jesse McCartney, Jason Lee, David Cross. Playing around while aboard a cruise ship, the Chipmunks and Chipettes accidentally go overboard and end up marooned in a tropical paradise. They discover their new turf is not as deserted as it seems.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Disgraceful,this trilogy gets worse as it goes on, ... A Nutshell Review: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chip-Wrecked ... Look in the Thesaurus under Execrable, Then Go Down from There ... If you've never liked the singing and dancing Chipmunk and Chipette trio, you're certainly not going to after this rehash of a sequel ... Thank goodness for Theodore!

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs...Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs...Animation starring Bruce Campbell and James Caan. When an inventor's machine causes it to rain food, greed takes over the town. (2009) [imdb description: Directed by Phil Lord, Christopher Miller. With Anna Faris, Bill Hader, Bruce Campbell, James Caan. A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know, that things are about to take a turn for the worst.] [imdb description: Directed by Phil Lord, Christopher Miller. With Anna Faris, Bill Hader, Bruce Campbell, James Caan. A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know, that things are about to take a turn for the worst.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Surprisingly imaginative, original and very funny ... Not only does justice to the book but takes its own sweep of originality and charm ... Fantastic! ... Possibly the funniest animated movie I've ever seen ... Sublimely Ridiculous

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: Elysium...Sci-fi adventure starring Matt Damon and Jodie Foster. A man seeks to restore parity between the wealthy inhabitants of a space station and the rest of the world. (2013) [imdb description: Directed by Neill Blomkamp. With Matt Damon, Jodie Foster, Sharlto Copley, Alice Braga. In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth. A man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Elysium is visually gorgeous but its story and characters left me cold and disappointed ... Liked the CGI and sets, but didn't like the story ... Elysium gets worse and worse the more I reflect on it... ... Lacking in Motivation ... It is flawed and by no means anywhere near on the same level as D9 but its solid entertainment and a smarter than average sci/fi film.

programme.review: Viewers comments : A 10-star 2-hour movie screaming to get out of a 7-star 3-hour movie ... Truly A Masterpiece! ... Too much, too long, too bad ... Wow ... A roaring success

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk

Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he emerges whenever he loses his temper. However, Banner then must fight a soldier whom unleashes himself as a threat stronger than he.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Attention - Origin Mixture!!! ... A whole lot better than you think ... Finally a bit of meat and potato's to go with my green eggs and ham... ... programme.desc: Raid on Rommel...Raid on Rommel...(1971) The great Richard Burton is the commando chief leading an audacious raid behind enemy lines in this action-packed WWII drama. His mission: to blow up Rommel's gun battery [imdb description: Directed by Henry Hathaway. With Richard Burton, John Colicos, Clinton Greyn, Wolfgang Preiss. Captain Foster plans on raiding German-occupied Tobruk with hand-picked commandos, but a mix-up leaves him with a medical unit containing a Quaker conscientious objector. Despite all odds they succeed with their mission. On the way they pick up and drug the mistress of an Italian general, blow up the entire fuel supply for the Afrika Korps, and swap philatelic gossip with Field Marshal Erwin ...] [imdb description: Directed by Henry Hathaway. With Richard Burton, John Colicos, Clinton Greyn, Wolfgang Preiss. programme.review: Viewers comments : The older and wiser you get, the deeper this movie becomes. ... Semi-Autobiographical, Often-Profound and Moving Story of a Writer's Life ... A big popular star film of its time... ... Hemingway's life and lovers , being well incarnated by Gregory Peck ... So-so film that is never as complex or as tragic as it should have been and is a lot less interesting for it

programme.title: Raid on Rommel
programme.desc: Raid on Rommel...Raid on Rommel...(1971) The great Richard Burton is the commando chief leading an audacious raid behind enemy lines in this action-packed WWII drama. His mission: to blow up Rommel's gun battery [imdb description: Directed by Henry Hathaway. With Richard Burton, John Colicos, Clinton Greyn, Wolfgang Preiss. Captain Foster plans on raiding German-occupied Tobruk with hand-picked commandos, but a mix-up leaves him with a medical unit containing a Quaker conscientious objector. Despite all odds they succeed with their mission. On the way they pick up and drug the mistress of an Italian general, blow up the entire fuel supply for the Afrika Korps, and swap philatelic gossip with Field Marshal Erwin ...] [imdb description: Directed by Henry Hathaway. With Richard Burton, John Colicos, Clinton Greyn, Wolfgang Preiss. Captain Foster plans on raiding German-occupied Tobruk with hand-picked commandos, but a mix-up leaves him with a medical unit containing a Quaker conscientious objector. Despite all odds they succeed with their mission. On the way they pick up and drug the mistress of an Italian general, blow up the entire fuel supply for the Afrika Korps, and swap philatelic gossip with Field Marshal Erwin ...]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Rushed and Poorly Produced WWII Fare ... A really bad movie ... Reasonable desert war movie ... A weak film of Henry Hathaway. ... The Shakespearean Action Hero

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit II
programme.desc: Smokey and the Bandit Ride Again...(1980) Burt Reynolds and his tache return for this farcical road trip adventure. Bandit has to haul a pregnant elephant to Dallas, but Sheriff Buford T Justice is in hot pursuit! [imdb description: Directed by Hal Needham. With Burt Reynolds, Jackie Gleason, Jerry Reed, Dom DeLuise. The Bandit goes on another cross-country run, transporting an elephant from Florida to Texas. And, once again, Sheriff Buford T. Justice is on his tail.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Highly Anticipated and Extremely Disappointing Sequel. ... Not that great ... It needed Olivier, it Got Kramden ... Narcissism is hardly funny... ... The Bandit and Snowman at It again

programme.desc: True-life wartime drama starring Richard Todd and Michael Redgrave, 1954. The story of the World War II bombing raid on German dams using the 'bouncing bomb' invented by Barnes Wallis

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: One Way Ticket: Reality series. The pawn shop team investigate a gold record signed by theatrical rockers Kiss, and Corey pulls a prank on Chumlee. S7 Ep3

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Unprankable: Reality series. The pawn shop crew evaluate a 1960 Chevy Corvair and a cheque signed by an ex-vice president, while Corey plots his revenge on Chumlee. S7 Ep4

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Reality series. An error from Joe carries huge consequences for Papac, while Gabe enlists the help of one of the lumberjacking world's biggest bits of kit. S7 Ep12

programme.title: Nighthawks
programme.desc: Cops versus terrorist thriller starring Sylvester Stallone and Billy Dee Williams, 1981. An international terrorist arrives in New York intent upon wreaking havoc and only one man can stop him

programme.title: FYI Daily
programme.desc: A round up of the latest entertainment news

programme.title: Nighthawks
programme.desc: Cops versus terrorist thriller starring Sylvester Stallone and Billy Dee Williams, 1981. An international terrorist arrives in New York intent upon wreaking havoc and only one man can stop him

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Expert navigation through the jungle is needed as extreme angler Jeremy Wade heads to Colombia to investigate a creature blamed for killing a bride in the Amazon. S5 Ep4

programme.title: Rugby Highlights: Aviva...
programme.desc: ...Premiership. Mark Durden-Smith and David Flatman present highlights from the Madejski Stadium as London Irish take on Harlequins. Also Exeter v Wasps and Saracens v Newcastle Falcons. S3 Ep21

programme.title: The Chief
programme.desc: Drama series about a controversial chief constable. Hiring and firing is the name of the game when Chief Constable Alan Cade gets tough with his force, much to their consternation. S3 Ep4

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: Drama series set in a busy city hospital. Christine's relationship with Robert deteriorates, and she accuses him of siding with Jack over a dubious diagnosis. S3 Ep3

programme.title: The Grand
programme.desc: Period drama series about a luxury hotel. It is New Year's Eve 1919, and the lavish reopening of the Grand Hotel soon turns sour for its owner John Bannerman. S1 Ep1

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: There are problems when PC Bellamy has to organise a talent contest. Nick and Kate's relationship is put to the test when one of her old flames arrives. S2 Ep7

programme.title: Lillie
programme.desc: Drama series about Lillie Langtry. Lillie begins a liaison with Prince Rudolph of Austria, forcing the Prince of Wales to present her at court as his official consort. S1 Ep6

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Classic period drama. While Hazel is away for a few days, Lady Prudence does her bit for the war effort by organising a charity entertainment event. S4 Ep10

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: A wealthy man is murdered before he can change his will, which is then stolen. A doctor comes under suspicion, but Poirot avoids jumping to conclusions. S5 Ep4

programme.title: Churchill's Secret
programme.desc: After Prime Minister Winston Churchill suffers a life-threatening stroke, the news is kept secret and as his family gather at his bedside, long-buried tensions begin to surface

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Poirot investigates when the wife of an archaeological dig's leader is murdered

programme.title: Houdini & Doyle
programme.desc: Author Bram Stoker arrives at Doyle's house claiming a vampire hunter is trying to kill him. What is the dark secret he is desperately trying to hide from the world?

programme.title: The Catfish Awards
programme.desc: Lucille led a simple life until she was asked to work for music producer Kidd Cole. Companies were never paid and one day Kidd couldn't be found. Will she get the answers she needs? (S3, ep4)

programme.title: The Catfish Awards
programme.desc: Brendan loves McKenna, but failed attempts to connect have left him wondering if McKenna is for real. Nev teams with social media sensation Karrueche Tran to help Brendan uncover the truth. (S5, ep4)

programme.title: The Catfish Awards
programme.desc: Falesha's name and pictures were stolen by a fake profile that nearly ruined her life. She thought her troubles were behind her, but four years later her past comes back to haunt her. (S4, ep12)

programme.title: The Catfish Awards
programme.desc: Kelsey. The two have never spoken outside of online chats but John is sure she's the one. Can he include Kelsey in his plans? (S3, ep6)

programme.title: The Catfish Awards
programme.desc: After a 3 year online relationship, Tiana moved across the country to be with the love of her life, James, and reveal her secret. Now in the same state, James seems more elusive than ever. (S4, ep11)

programme.title: The Catfish Awards
programme.desc: Superfan Keyonnah can hardly believe her luck, she's almost certain that she's been having an online relationship with her childhood crush, the rapper Bow Wow. Is this too good to be true? (S2, ep15)

programme.title: The Catfish Awards
programme.desc: Jasmine has been texting with Mike for two years and thinks he could be the perfect step-father for her son. Although they live only 15 minutes apart, the pair have yet to meet up in person. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: Lip Sync Battle
programme.desc: Celebrities pair up to do battle using lip sync as their weapon to outdo each other, and the audience is the judge! In this episode Common and John Legend go head-to-head. (S1, ep2)

programme.title: MTV'S Bugging Out
programme.desc: In this premiere episode hosts Rob Anderson & Traci Stumpf take on drones gone rogue, talking pets, and a GPS system that won't shut up, plus more. (S1, ep1)

programme.title: Car Crash Couples
programme.desc: The race goes to Amsterdam. Hunter gets into deep water with Steph. Rob drops a bombshell. Stephanie suspects Hunter of cheating. Is the competition proving too much for them already? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: Marnie necks on with new lad Marty to teach Aaron a lesson. Charlotte's got Chloe's back when it all kicks off between the girls. Gary and Charlotte end up in bed causing ripples. (S12, ep7)

programme.title: New: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Tyreme met the beautiful Tomorrow online over 9 months ago. Tyreme is ready to uproot his life to be with her. Will Nev and Max be able help Tyreme finally meet his Tomorrow? (S5, ep9)

programme.title: New: Eye Candy
programme.desc: While Jake and Lindy are on their way to find out what happened to her sister, Tommy is on his way to discover The Flirtual Killer. (S1,ep9)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: The Forger...The Forger...John Travolta stars as a master art forger tasked with a pulling off a daring heist. Thriller with Christopher Plummer and Tye Sheridan. Strong language. (2014)(92 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by Philip Martin. With John Travolta, Christopher Plummer, Tye Sheridan, Abigail Spencer. A thief works with his father and son to forge a painting by Monet and steal the original. Together, they plan the heist of their lives.] [imdb description: Directed by Philip Martin. With John Travolta, Christopher Plummer, Tye Sheridan, Abigail Spencer. A thief works with his father and son to forge a painting by Monet and steal the original. Together, they plan the heist of their lives.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Paint Job ... Touching father / son / grandson story ... Not bad to watch. ... Decent Thriller Drama ... nice film

programme.title: Ted 2: Unrated
programme.desc: Ted 2...Ted 2...The Thunder Buddies are back, this time taking the fight to the powers that be to protect Ted's rights. Comedy sequel with Mark Wahlberg and the voice of Seth MacFarlane. (2015)(121 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by Seth MacFarlane. With Mark Wahlberg, Seth MacFarlane, Amanda Seyfried, Jessica Barth. Newlywed couple Ted and Tami-Lynn want to have a baby, but in order to qualify to be a parent, Ted will have to prove he's a person in a court of law.] [imdb description: Directed by Seth MacFarlane. With Mark Wahlberg, Seth MacFarlane, Amanda Seyfried, Jessica Barth. Newlywed couple Ted and Tami-Lynn want to have a baby, but in order to qualify to be a parent, Ted will have to prove he's a person in a court of law.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Not so much stupid as boring with an occasional giggle ... Spared For The Laughs ... Good one-liners and gags, zero plot. ... Better to stare at the wall than watch Ted 2 ... Not as funny as the first, the magic is wearing off

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: The Longest Ride...Art student Britt Robertson finds herself falling for Scott Eastwood's bull-rider. Adaption of the bestselling romance novel with Alan Alda. Sex/flashing images. (2015)(123 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by George Tillman Jr.. With Scott Eastwood, Britt Robertson, Alan Alda, Jack Huston. The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Much better than than the reviews have one believe!! ... A Very Great Romantic Drama Movie. ... 'The Notebook' meets '8 Seconds' ... Half A Good Romance Tale, Yet One of The Better Sparks ... I really liked this movie, this is a feel good movie if that's what you need

programme.title: Dying of the Light
programme.desc: Dying of the Light...Dying of the Light...Illness is forcing veteran CIA agent Nicolas Cage to retire, but not before he takes out his terrorist nemesis. Thriller co-starring Anton Yelchin. (2014)(90 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by Paul Schrader. With Nicolas Cage, Anton Yelchin, Alexander Karim, Irène Jacob. When a devastating illness threatens to end Evan Lake's career in the C.I.A., he goes rogue to hunt down a terrorist who tortured him during a mission gone awry years ago.] [imdb description: Directed by Paul Schrader. With Nicolas Cage, Anton Yelchin, Alexander Karim, Irène Jacob. When a devastating illness threatens to end Evan Lake's career in the C.I.A., he goes rogue to hunt down a terrorist who tortured him during a mission gone awry years ago.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : A dark and brooding affair, Dying of the Light plays out exactly as the title suggests. ... Another Nicholas Cage in Romania crapfest ... The ear was literally the most fascinating part of this movie ... Probably won't see much of Cage after this flop ... Worse movie I had seen in a while

programme.title: The Overnight
programme.desc: The Overnight...The Overnight...Two couples have a dinner party that quickly goes off the deep end. LA-set adult comedy with Taylor Schilling and Jason Schwartzman. Strong language/sex/flashing images. (2015)(82 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by Patrick Brice. With Adam Scott, Taylor Schilling, Jason Schwartzman, Judith Godrèche. Alex, Emily, and their son, RJ, are new to Los Angeles. A chance meeting at the park introduces them to the mysterious Kurt, Charlotte, and Max. A family "playdate" becomes increasingly interesting as the night goes on.] [imdb description: Directed by Patrick Brice. With Adam Scott, Taylor Schilling, Jason Schwartzman, Judith Godrèche. Alex, Emily, and their son, RJ, are new to Los Angeles. A chance meeting at the park introduces them to the mysterious Kurt, Charlotte, and Max. A family "playdate" becomes increasingly interesting as the night goes on.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Odd, dark, and very unpredictable ... A little sincerity pierces through this oddball mumblecore comedy. ... The Sleepover ... Sometimes, at a party you don't really know whats going on... Then, when you think a little later and the only word you can say is F*****************CK! ... Exactly what you'd expect and less

programme.title: Partisan
programme.desc: Partisan...Partisan...A young boy raised to be an assassin begins to question the ways of his community's cult-like leader. Drama with Jeremy Chabriel and Vincent Cassel. Violent scenes. (2015)(94 mins) [imdb description: Directed by Ariel Kleiman. With Vincent Cassel, Jeremy Chabriel, Florence Mezzara, Esther Blaser-Tokarev. Alexander, a boy who has been raised in a sequestered commune, finds that his increasing unwillingness to fall in line puts him on a collision course with Gregori, the society's charismatic and domineering leader.] [imdb description: Directed by Ariel Kleiman. With Vincent Cassel, Jeremy Chabriel, Florence Mezzara, Esther Blaser-Tokarev. Alexander, a boy who has been raised in a sequestered commune, finds that his increasing unwillingness to fall in line puts him on a collision course with Gregori, the society's charismatic and domineering leader.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Child soldiers in a su} commune fortress ... Richly Layered ... Scary Utopia, brilliant acting. ... A dark and intelligent, character driven film. ... A flawed gem; technically amazing but perhaps too ambiguous for its own good

Judi Dench stars in Jane Austen's classic tale of men, marriage and misunderstandings. (2005)(122 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by Joe Wright. With Keira Knightley, Matthew Macfadyen, Brenda Blethyn, Donald Sutherland. Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Outstanding...MacFadyen is a worthy Darcy. ... Jane Austen for ever ... Spirited Modern Interpretation of Austen's Classic Love Story ... Jane Austen is spinning in her grave. ... Minor errors? But Pride was constipation, they forgot Prejudice. And Austen come to that.

programme.title: The Fault In Our Stars
programme.desc: The Fault in Our Stars...The Fault in Our Stars...Shailene Woodley and Ansel Elgort play two teens who meet at a cancer support group and fall in love. Touching drama based on the much-loved novel. Strong language. (2014)(127 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by Josh Boone. With Shailene Woodley, Ansel Elgort, Nat Wolff, Laura Dern. Two teenage cancer patients begin a life-affirming journey to visit a reclusive author in Amsterdam.] [imdb description: Directed by Josh Boone. With Shailene Woodley, Ansel Elgort, Nat Wolff, Laura Dern. Two teenage cancer patients begin a life-affirming journey to visit a reclusive author in Amsterdam.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : I've Saved my Ten for This Film ... Sad, But Incredibly Beautiful ... Bring Kleenex. Lots of Kleenex. ... Was this shot on film? Cause there's a lot of chemistry involved! ... Would happily see this again!

programme.title: Definitely, Maybe
programme.desc: Definitely, Maybe...Definitely, Maybe...Divorcing dad Ryan Reynolds tells daughter Abigail Breslin about his three great loves, but which is he meant to be with? Romcom. Some strong language/sexual references. (2008)(108 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by Adam Brooks. With Ryan Reynolds, Rachel Weisz, Abigail Breslin, An Nguyen. A political consultant tries to explain his impending divorce and past relationships to his 11-year-old daughter.] [imdb description: Directed by Adam Brooks. With Ryan Reynolds, Rachel Weisz, Abigail Breslin, An Nguyen. A political consultant tries to explain his impending divorce and past relationships to his 11-year-old daughter.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Seen worse. Seen a whole lot worse. ... Saw an advance screening and actually enjoyed it! ... Definitely a must see movie ... A nice romantic movie for the nostalgic viewer ... A Nutshell Review: Definitely, Maybe

programme.title: The Second Best Exotic...
programme.desc: ...Marigold Hotel: When their Indian hotel reaches capacity, managers Dev Patel and Maggie Smith set their sights on expansion. Good-natured comedy sequel with Judi Dench. (2015)(118 mins) Also in HD

programme.title: Coyote Ugly
programme.desc: Coyote Ugly...Coyote Ugly...Naive songwriter Piper Perabo goes to New York to make it big, but is soon forced to take a bar job at the notoriously rowdy Coyote Ugly. Fun teen drama with Adam Garcia. (2000)(97 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by David McNally. With Piper Perabo, Adam Garcia, John Goodman, Maria Bello. Aspiring songwriter Violet Sanford, after getting a job at a women-run NYC bar that teases its male patrons, comes out of her shell.] [imdb description: Directed by David McNally. With Piper Perabo, Adam Garcia, John Goodman, Maria Bello. Aspiring songwriter Violet Sanford, after getting a job at a women-run NYC bar that teases its male patrons, comes out of her shell.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Coyote Ugly Was A "Feel Good" Film ... Heartwarming story overcomes sappy bits. ... Insubstantial but highly entertaining ... An interesting, excellent surprise. ... Familiar story still has great energy, and works for me!!!

programme.title: The Matrix
programme.desc: The Matrix...Mind-blowing sci-fi actioner starring Keanu Reeves as Neo, a computer hacker who has his world turned upside down when he discovers that his reality is a lie. Violence. (1999)(131 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski. With Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss, Hugo Weaving. A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : The benchmark for all sci-fi films to come ... Immensely entertaining, intriguingly philosophical and just about one of the best films ever made! ... What is the Matrix? Well, one of the best films ever, for one thing... ... Stunning and wild... ... Raises the bar for sci-fi films for years to come

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A.I. Artificial Intelligence...Haley Joel Osment is the robot boy who wants only to be human, Jude Law the mechanical gigolo helping him find his future. Inventive Steven Spielberg sci-fi. (2001)(140 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by Steven Spielberg. With Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, Frances O'Connor, Sam Robards. A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Future classic...? ... A.I.--A Film With Heart And Brains ... Classic Stanley Kubrick !! ... One of the year's best films -- thought-provoking and deeply moving. ***1/2 (out of four) ... Extraordinary.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Ghost Rider...Motorbike stuntman Nicolas Cage does a deal with the Devil and becomes a skull-faced avenger on two fiery wheels. Sci-fi. Contains violence and flashing images. (2007)(106 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by Mark Steven Johnson. With Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes, Sam Elliott, Matt Long. Stunt motorcyclist Johnny Blaze gives up his soul to become a hellblazing vigilante, to fight against power hungry Blackheart, the son of the devil himself.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Hell of a Ride ... Awesome flick if you like some cheesy fun ... Better Than Critics Think ... Hysterically funny ... Somewhere Between X-Men and Spiderman

programme.title: The League Of Extraordinary...
programme.desc: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen......Gentlemen: Sean Connery is the adventurer who joins Captain Nemo, the Invisible Man, Dorian Gray and other fictional heroes to save the world. Action. Contains violence. (2003)(120 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by Stephen Norrington. With Sean Connery, Stuart Townsend, Peta Wilson, Jason Flemyng. In an alternate Victorian Age world, a group of famous contemporary fantasy, SF and adventure characters team up on a secret mission.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Heavens, it wasn't THAT bad! ... An underestimated but very interesting movie ... Enjoyable! ... A film that deserved a better fate ... Surprisingly entertaining

programme.title: The Matrix
programme.desc: The Matrix...Mind-blowing sci-fi actioner starring Keanu Reeves as Neo, a computer hacker who has his world turned upside down when he discovers that his reality is a lie. Violence. programme.review: Viewers comments : The benchmark for all sci-fi films to come ... Immensely entertaining, intriguingly philosophical and just about one of the best films ever made! ... What is the Matrix? Well, one of the best films ever, for one thing... ... Stunning and wild... ... Raises the bar for sci-fi films for years to come

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: Annabelle...In this creepy prequel to hit horror The Conjuring, married couple Ward Horton and Annabelle Wallis are tormented by a doll that has been possessed by an evil spirit. (2014)(85 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by John R. Leonetti. With Ward Horton, Annabelle Wallis, Alfre Woodard, Tony Amendola. A couple begins to experience terrifying supernatural occurrences involving a vintage doll shortly after their home is invaded by satanic cultists.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Pitiful cash-grab. ... She's like Chucky, only boring! ... As a horror film, Annabelle is technically effective but lacks a good story and the finesse of a seasoned film maker. ... Good October Fun ... Annabelle the doll is scary. This movie is not.

programme.title: El Dorado
programme.desc: El Dorado...Gun fighter John Wayne and sheriff Robert Mitchum take on ruthless cattle baron Ed Asner in Howard Hawks' outstanding Western. James Caan also stars. (1966)(122 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by Howard Hawks. With John Wayne, Robert Mitchum, James Caan, Charlene Holt. Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with an old friend, Sheriff J.P. Hara. Together with an old Indian fighter and a gambler, they help a rancher and his family fight a rival rancher that is trying to steal their water.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : "Ride Baldy Ride, to the end of the rainbow." ... One of the Great American Westerns... ... A Pleasant Surprise ... Crushingly wonderful (slight spoilers) ... There is some deliberate burlesque in Hawks' "El Dorado."

programme.title: The Guns Of Navarone
programme.desc: The Guns of Navarone...Gregory Peck and Anthony Quayle lead their troops on a risky mission to destroy the Nazi guns that guard their escape route. Oscar-winning World War II action. (1961)(150 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by J. Lee Thompson. With David Niven, Gregory Peck, Anthony Quinn, Anthony Quayle. A British team is sent to cross occupied Greek territory and destroy the massive German gun emplacement that commands a key sea channel.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Affectionately crafted piece of art that is sadly under-appreciated by the typical modern "soundbite" moviegoer. ... Every bit as good as you remembered... ... Outstanding war drama ... This has everything that I'm looking for in a classic war movie... ... Solid, Man's WWII Movie

programme.title: As Good As It Gets
programme.desc: As Good as It Gets...As Good as It Gets...Jack Nicholson and Helen Hunt are on Oscar-winning form as a cranky novelist and the struggling single mum he falls for. Bittersweet comedy. Strong language/mature themes. (1997)(134 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by James L. Brooks. With Jack Nicholson, Helen Hunt, Greg Kinnear, Cuba Gooding Jr.. A single mother/waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery..] [imdb description: Directed by James L. Brooks. With Jack Nicholson, Helen Hunt, Greg Kinnear, Cuba Gooding Jr.. A single mother/waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery..]
programme.review: Viewers comments : How to create something out of nothing? Ask Mark Andrus and Jim L. Brooks ... As Good as Romantic Comedies Get ... This comedy is as good as it gets! ... A superior Hollywood piece of sentimentality ... Way to go, Jack!

programme.title: Whiplash
programme.desc: Whiplash...Whiplash...Miles Teller's ambitious young jazz drummer enrols at a cut-throat music conservatory. Explosive drama with an Oscar-winning turn from JK Simmons. (2014)(103 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by Damien Chazelle. With Miles Teller, J.K. Simmons, Melissa Benoist, Paul Reiser. A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.] [imdb description: Directed by Damien Chazelle. With Miles Teller, J.K. Simmons, Melissa Benoist, Paul Reiser. A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : An incredibly powerful film! ... An important hardened lesson in resilience and when to stop measuring up to your mentor. Whiplash is a captivating study of ambition. ... Tension, tension, tension! ... Wow just wow. Easily one of the greatest films of the year ... They could have done better

programme.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest...
programme.desc: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest...One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest...Jack Nicholson stars as a convicted crook who cons his way into a mental institution expecting an easier ride. Multiple Oscar-winning drama. Strong language. (1975)(129 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by Milos Forman. With Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher, Michael Berryman, Peter Brocco. A criminal pleads insanity after getting into trouble again and once in the mental institution rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.] [imdb description: Directed by Milos Forman. With Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher, Michael Berryman, Peter Brocco. A criminal pleads insanity after getting into trouble again and once in the mental institution rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Both uplifting and disheartening, sometimes both at once ... Touching and moving, a great cinematic experience ... Poetic - Powerful - Simple: The Greatness of Cuckoo's Nest. ... A great order vs. chaos tale that everyone can relate to ... "What an excellent movie" is all that went through my mind after seeing this masterpiece

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: Eyes Wide Shut...Eyes Wide Shut...Stanley Kubrick's erotic odyssey marks the end of the late director's brilliant career, with Tom Cruise and Nicole Kidman as a couple exploring their sexuality. (1999)(159 mins) Also in HD [imdb description: Directed by Stanley Kubrick. With Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Todd Field, Sydney Pollack. A New York City doctor, who is married to an art curator, pushes himself on a harrowing and dangerous night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife admits that she once almost cheated on him.] [imdb description: Directed by Stanley Kubrick. With Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Todd Field, Sydney Pollack. A New York City doctor, who is married to an art curator, pushes himself on a harrowing and dangerous night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife admits that she once almost cheated on him.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Kubrick's Gift to us all. "I have seen one or two things in my life but never, never anything like this." ... An impressive film with a bad marketing campaign ... Be prepared to think ... Mis-marketed and misunderstood, among Kubrick's best ... A fitting completion to Kubrick's study of humanity

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: The Forger...The Forger...John Travolta stars as a master art forger tasked with a pulling off a daring heist. Thriller with Christopher Plummer and Tye Sheridan. Strong language. (2014)(92 mins) [imdb description: Directed by Philip Martin. With John Travolta, Christopher Plummer, Tye Sheridan, Abigail Spencer. A thief works with his father and son to forge a painting by Monet and steal the original. Together, they plan the heist of their lives.] [imdb description: Directed by Philip Martin. With John Travolta, Christopher Plummer, Tye Sheridan, Abigail Spencer. A thief works with his father and son to forge a painting by Monet and steal the original. Together, they plan the heist of their lives.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Paint Job ... Touching father / son / grandson story ... Not bad to watch. ... Decent Thriller Drama ... nice film

programme.title: Ted 2: Unrated
programme.desc: Ted 2...Ted 2...The Thunder Buddies are back, this time taking the fight to the powers that be to protect Ted's rights. Comedy sequel with Mark Wahlberg and the voice of Seth MacFarlane. (2015)(121 mins) [imdb description: Directed by Seth MacFarlane. With Mark Wahlberg, Seth MacFarlane, Amanda Seyfried, Jessica Barth. Newlywed couple Ted and Tami-Lynn want to have a baby, but in order to qualify to be a parent, Ted will have to prove he's a person in a court of law.] [imdb description: Directed by Seth MacFarlane. With Mark Wahlberg, Seth MacFarlane, Amanda Seyfried, Jessica Barth. Newlywed couple Ted and Tami-Lynn want to have a baby, but in order to qualify to be a parent, Ted will have to prove he's a person in a court of law.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Not so much stupid as boring with an occasional giggle ... Spared For The Laughs ... Good one-liners and gags, zero plot. ... Better to stare at the wall than watch Ted 2 ... Not as funny as the first, the magic is wearing off

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: The Longest Ride...Art student Britt Robertson finds herself falling for Scott Eastwood's bull-rider. Adaption of the bestselling romance novel with Alan Alda. Sex/flashing images. (2015)(123 mins) [imdb description: Directed by George Tillman Jr.. With Scott Eastwood, Britt Robertson, Alan Alda, Jack Huston. The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Much better than than the reviews have one believe!! ... A Very Great Romantic Drama Movie. ... 'The Notebook' meets '8 Seconds' ... Half A Good Romance Tale, Yet One of The Better Sparks ... I really liked this movie, this is a feel good movie if that's what you need

programme.title: Dying of the Light
programme.desc: Dying of the Light...Dying of the Light...Illness is forcing veteran CIA agent Nicolas Cage to retire, but not before he takes out his terrorist nemesis. Thriller co-starring Anton Yelchin. (2014)(90 mins) [imdb description: Directed by Paul Schrader. With Nicolas Cage, Anton Yelchin, Alexander Karim, Irène Jacob. When a devastating illness threatens to end Evan Lake's career in the C.I.A., he goes rogue to hunt down a terrorist who tortured him during a mission gone awry years ago.] [imdb description: Directed by Paul Schrader. With Nicolas Cage, Anton Yelchin, Alexander Karim, Irène Jacob. When a devastating illness threatens to end Evan Lake's career in the C.I.A., he goes rogue to hunt down a terrorist who tortured him during a mission gone awry years ago.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : A dark and brooding affair, Dying of the Light plays out exactly as the title suggests. ... Another Nicholas Cage in Romania crapfest ... The ear was literally the most fascinating part of this movie ... Probably won't see much of Cage after this flop ... Worse movie I had seen in a while

programme.title: The Overnight
programme.desc: The Overnight...The Overnight...Two couples have a dinner party that quickly goes off the deep end. LA-set adult comedy with Taylor Schilling and Jason Schwartzman. Strong language/sex/flashing images. (2015)(82 mins) [imdb description: Directed by Patrick Brice. With Adam Scott, Taylor Schilling, Jason Schwartzman, Judith Godrèche. Alex, Emily, and their son, RJ, are new to Los Angeles. A chance meeting at the park introduces them to the mysterious Kurt, Charlotte, and Max. A family "playdate" becomes increasingly interesting as the night goes on.] [imdb description: Directed by Patrick Brice. With Adam Scott, Taylor Schilling, Jason Schwartzman, Judith Godrèche. Alex, Emily, and their son, RJ, are new to Los Angeles. A chance meeting at the park introduces them to the mysterious Kurt, Charlotte, and Max. A family "playdate" becomes increasingly interesting as the night goes on.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Odd, dark, and very unpredictable ... A little sincerity pierces through this oddball mumblecore comedy. ... The Sleepover ... Sometimes, at a party you don't really know whats going on... Then, when you think a little later and the only word you can say is F*****************CK! ... Exactly what you'd expect and less

programme.title: Self-Portrait
programme.desc: On Filmmaking: Quentin Tarantino, David Fincher, Steve McQueen, Peter Jackson and more talk candidly to Film4 about the art of directing

programme.title: Ramona and Beezus
programme.desc: Ramona and Beezus...Ramona and Beezus...(2010) Gentle family comedy. Joey King stars as a nine-year-old girl who continually gets into a variety of scrapes. But when her dad loses his job, she decides to save the family home [imdb description: Directed by Elizabeth Allen Rosenbaum. With Joey King, Selena Gomez, Bridget Moynahan, John Corbett. An adventurous young girl uses her imagination to escape her reality, that is quickly spinning out of reach.] [imdb description: Directed by Elizabeth Allen Rosenbaum. With Joey King, Selena Gomez, Bridget Moynahan, John Corbett. An adventurous young girl uses her imagination to escape her reality, that is quickly spinning out of reach.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : A cute little film ... One of the best movies I have ever seen! ... Utterly adorable, one of the best family flicks of the year, everyone will love it! ... "Ramona Will make You Fall In Love With Her" ... A good family film

programme.title: Krull
programme.desc: Krull...(1983) Sci-fi fantasy starring Ken Marshall and Lysette Anthony. The union of a prince and a princess from rival kingdoms may be planet Krull's only hope of defeating an alien invasion [imdb description: Directed by Peter Yates. With Ken Marshall, Lysette Anthony, Freddie Jones, Francesca Annis. A prince and a fellowship of companions set out to rescue his bride from a fortress of alien invaders who have arrived on their home planet.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Why you MUST give Krull a second look. ... Serious film criticism has no place here! ... I might regret saying this some time down the road, but Krull is a really fun 80s sci-fi/fantasy adventure. ... A superb classic that should be more revered.. ... A gem from the Fantasy Boom of the 80's

programme.title: Self-Portrait
programme.desc: On Acting: Tom Hanks, Judi Dench, Leonardo DiCaprio, Olivia Colman and more talk candidly to Film4 about the art of screen acting

programme.title: Iron Man
programme.desc: Iron Man...(2008) Action fantasy. An ex-arms dealer (Robert Downey Jr) is reborn as Iron Man, the scourge of warmongers worldwide. But he must fight violent threats, some from an unexpected source [imdb description: Directed by Jon Favreau. With Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard, Jeff Bridges. After being held captive in an Afghan cave, a billionaire engineer creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Delivers Intelligence & Great Acting with its Fun ... Film That Lives Up To Its Hype And The Expectations Of Comic Readers ... Not bad at all ... Surprisingly Well Done ... Wow, very impressive !!!!

programme.title: Iron Man 2
programme.desc: Iron Man 2...(2010) Action adventure sequel. Robert Downey Jr returns as the wealthy inventor who battles warmongers. But his troubles multiply after his identity is revealed. programme.review: Viewers comments : Iron Man 2 is Totally Worth it. ... A worthwhile action-packed sequel ... Another magnificent superhero sequel. ... Time for an Upgrade ... Solid action-packed funny sequel

programme.desc: Killer Joe...Killer Joe...(2011) Darkly comic, brutally violent crime thriller. Matthew McConaughey plays a cop who's also a hitman. With Emile Hirsch and Juno Temple. programme.title: New Adventures Of Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Comic book adventures with Lynda Carter as the eponymous heroine. Diana goes undercover when a deadly virus stolen from a government laboratory is hidden in a computer-dating device. S3, Ep18/24

programme.title: The Seasoning House
programme.desc: The Seasoning House...Psychological terror starring Sean Pertwee (Gotham). When her friend is savagely killed, a young girl can no longer contain her rage and sets out to seek justice. (2012) [imdb description: Directed by Paul Hyett. With Rosie Day, Sean Pertwee, Kevin Howarth, Anna Walton. The Seasoning House: where young girls are prostituted to the military. An orphaned deaf mute is enslaved to care for them. She moves between the walls and crawlspaces, showing the little kindnesses when she can. When fate brings the men that murdered her family and the reason she ended up in the whore house, a chain of events begins that will end her captivity, free the girls still alive in the ...]
programme.review: Viewers comments : It's bold but brilliant cinema... ... A tragic tale of love, loss and death, this is one film you won't forget in a hurry. ... A darkly tense revenge thriller, laced with a palpable sense of menace. ... Four devastating Seasons in one House... ... Surpassed my expectations

programme.review: Viewers comments : Vampire Western Comedy ... Harmonious combination of classic genres ... Has a charm and power lacking in most contemporary vampire films ... The Not-So-Evil Dead... ... A funny comedy-horror movie

programme.title: Remembrance of Love
programme.desc: Remembrance of Love...Remembrance of Love...Romantic drama starring Kirk Douglas. Joe Rabin, a Holocaust survivor, journeys to Israel in search of his first love whom he was separated from during the war... Directed by Jack Smight. (1982) [imdb description: Directed by Jack Smight. With Kirk Douglas, Robert Clary, Pam Dawber, Eric Douglas. Joe Rabin is a Holocaust survivor. After the war he went to America, married someone and had a family. Today, he is on his way to Israel for a reunion of Holocaust survivors. It seems that he has another reason for going. It seems like during the war, he had a girlfriend and they were separated and she was pregnant. He has never found out what happened to her, or their baby, he hopes to find out ...] [imdb description: Directed by Jack Smight. With Kirk Douglas, Robert Clary, Pam Dawber, Eric Douglas. programme.desc: Henry Farr leads a mundane life in Wimbledon. Fed-up with being bullied by his wife, Henry decides to take drastic action and murder her, but things go terribly wrong. Part 1 of 2. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Glengarry Glen Ross

programme.review: Viewers comments : Not as good as the first ... Good sequel to "The Lost World". ... Why was this made? ... A very well produced sequel to the 1992 film ... Enjoyable sequel to 1992's Lost World

programme.title: Hope And Glory
programme.desc: Hope and Glory...Hope and Glory...This semi-autobiographical tale centres around the film's director John Boorman and his childhood growing up in London during the blitz of WWII. (1987) [imdb description: Directed by John Boorman. With Sarah Miles, David Hayman, Sebastian Rice-Edwards, Geraldine Muir. A semi-autobiographical project by John Boorman about a nine year old boy called Bill as he grows up in London during the blitz of World War 2. For a young boy, this time in history was more of an adventure, a total upheaval of order, restrictions and discipline. The liberating effect of the war on the women left behind. And the joy when Hitler blows up your school.] [imdb description: Directed by John Boorman. With Sarah Miles, David Hayman, Sebastian Rice-Edwards, Geraldine Muir. A semi-autobiographical project by John Boorman about a nine year old boy called Bill as he grows up in London during the blitz of World War 2. programme.review: Viewers comments : Through the eyes of a child ... snapshot of a time past ... A Funny, poignant, truthful, and enjoyable child's-eye view of London during The Blitz. ... tune in tonight ... A perennial delight

programme.title: Ivanhoe
programme.desc: Ivanhoe...Ivanhoe...With his country in turmoil, Saxon knight Ivanhoe (Anthony Andrews) returns to England from the Crusades to find he's been disinherited and abandoned by his longtime love. (1982) [imdb description: Directed by Douglas Camfield. With James Mason, Anthony Andrews, Sam Neill, Michael Hordern. This is a remake of Walter Scott's Ivanhoe. He finds England under the reign of Prince John and his henchmen and finds himself being involved in the power-struggle for the throne of England. Will justice prevail and will all fair ladies in distress be rescued?] [imdb description: Directed by Douglas Camfield. With James Mason, Anthony Andrews, Sam Neill, Michael Hordern. programme.title: Operation Cross Eagles
programme.desc: A commando unit is sent to kidnap an important German commander in exchange for an American general. Stars Richard Conte. (1969)

programme.title: Churchill's Leopards
programme.desc: I Leopardi di Churchill...Two brothers are separated and eventually turned against each other at the start of WW2, only to be reunited by Churchill's audacious plan to blow up an important dam. (1970) [imdb description: Directed by Maurizio Pradeaux. With Richard Harrison, Pilar Velázquez, Giacomo Rossi Stuart, Frank Braña. programme.review: Viewers comments : Decent Little Italian-Spanish Action Flick ... Passable Spaghetti/Paella War movie co-produced by Italy/Spain and filmed in Spanish outdoors ... Routine movie featuring the great Kinski ... CHURCHILL'S LEOPARDS (Maurizo Pradeaux, 1970) **1/2 ... "Churchill's Leopards" keeps its heroes on the spot

programme.title: Pathfinders
programme.desc: Pathfinders: In the Company of Strangers...True story of the volunteer paratroopers whose mission was to land 30 minutes before the Normandy invasion, mark strategic 'dropzones' and set up equipment on D-Day. (2011) [imdb description: Directed by Curt A. Sindelar. With Christopher Serrone, Michael Conner Humphreys, Philip De Lorenzo, Kyle Erickson. Three companies of paratroopers travel in a deadly mission to France to prepare the drop zone for the airborne attack on the D-Day. They have to install an Eureka transmitter and searchlight to guide the planes in the Normandy invasion.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : ...you're kidding me right? ... Alas, not terribly good ... PVC British Glazed Houses in 1940 ... Badly Botched Effort ... Waste of a good story

programme.title: The Last Rescue
programme.desc: The Last Rescue...A group of US soldiers and nurses are stranded behind enemy lines following the D-Day landings. As tensions mount, they must devise a plan to get back to their unit. Stars Brett Cullen. (2015) [imdb description: Directed by Eric Colley. With Brett Cullen, Cody Kasch, Gilles Marini, Ryan Merriman. They take a high-ranking German officer as their prisoner and try to orchestrate an escape.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Not very good, ya ... It is almost like Saving Private Ryan, but without the Tiger tank. ... Try's Hard and partly succeeds.... ... I don't rate the scenario!!! Read and keep in mind that. ... Good effort, but ultimately fails.

programme.review: Viewers comments : Entertaining, but rough around the edges ... Unfortunate undeveloped story and cast ... Not the greatest, yet far from the worst WWII film ... Very poor adaptation of what could otherwise have been a fantastic film ... Great in it's class

programme.title: Ramona and Beezus
programme.desc: Ramona and Beezus...Ramona and Beezus...(2010) Gentle family comedy. Joey King stars as a nine-year-old girl who continually gets into a variety of scrapes. But when her dad loses his job, she decides to save the family home [imdb description: Directed by Elizabeth Allen Rosenbaum. With Joey King, Selena Gomez, Bridget Moynahan, John Corbett. An adventurous young girl uses her imagination to escape her reality, that is quickly spinning out of reach.] [imdb description: Directed by Elizabeth Allen Rosenbaum. With Joey King, Selena Gomez, Bridget Moynahan, John Corbett. An adventurous young girl uses her imagination to escape her reality, that is quickly spinning out of reach.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : A cute little film ... One of the best movies I have ever seen! ... Utterly adorable, one of the best family flicks of the year, everyone will love it! ... "Ramona Will make You Fall In Love With Her" ... A good family film

programme.title: Krull
programme.desc: Krull...(1983) Sci-fi fantasy starring Ken Marshall and Lysette Anthony. The union of a prince and a princess from rival kingdoms may be planet Krull's only hope of defeating an alien invasion [imdb description: Directed by Peter Yates. With Ken Marshall, Lysette Anthony, Freddie Jones, Francesca Annis. A prince and a fellowship of companions set out to rescue his bride from a fortress of alien invaders who have arrived on their home planet.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Why you MUST give Krull a second look. ... Serious film criticism has no place here! ... I might regret saying this some time down the road, but Krull is a really fun 80s sci-fi/fantasy adventure. ... A superb classic that should be more revered.. ... A gem from the Fantasy Boom of the 80's

programme.title: Self-Portrait
programme.desc: On Acting: Tom Hanks, Judi Dench, Leonardo DiCaprio, Olivia Colman and more talk candidly to Film4 about the art of screen acting

programme.title: Iron Man
programme.desc: Iron Man...(2008) Action fantasy. An ex-arms dealer (Robert Downey Jr) is reborn as Iron Man, the scourge of warmongers worldwide. But he must fight violent threats, some from an unexpected source [imdb description: Directed by Jon Favreau. With Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard, Jeff Bridges. After being held captive in an Afghan cave, a billionaire engineer creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Delivers Intelligence & Great Acting with its Fun ... Film That Lives Up To Its Hype And The Expectations Of Comic Readers ... Not bad at all ... Surprisingly Well Done ... Wow, very impressive !!!!

programme.title: Self-Portrait
programme.desc: On Acting: Tom Hanks, Judi Dench, Leonardo DiCaprio, Olivia Colman and more talk candidly to Film4 about the art of screen acting

programme.title: Iron Man 2
programme.desc: Iron Man 2...(2010) Action adventure sequel. Robert Downey Jr returns as the wealthy inventor who battles warmongers. But his troubles multiply after his identity is revealed. Violence [imdb description: Directed by Jon Favreau. With Robert Downey Jr., Mickey Rourke, Gwyneth Paltrow, Don Cheadle. With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : Iron Man 2 is Totally Worth it. ... A worthwhile action-packed sequel ... Another magnificent superhero sequel. ... Time for an Upgrade ... Solid action-packed funny sequel

programme.title: Killer Joe
programme.desc: Killer Joe...Killer Joe...(2011) Darkly comic, brutally violent crime thriller. Matthew McConaughey plays a cop who's also a hitman. With Emile Hirsch and Juno Temple. Adults only: sexual violence/strong language [imdb description: Directed by William Friedkin. With Matthew McConaughey, Emile Hirsch, Juno Temple, Thomas Haden Church. When a debt puts a young man's life in danger, he turns to putting a hit out on his evil mother in order to collect the insurance.] [imdb description: Directed by William Friedkin. With Matthew McConaughey, Emile Hirsch, Juno Temple, Thomas Haden Church. When a debt puts a young man's life in danger, he turns to putting a hit out on his evil mother in order to collect the insurance.]
programme.review: Viewers comments : in a nut-shell: a wild, soaked-in-gasoline-on-fire film-noir ... What did I just watch??? ... William Friedkin serves up Trailer Trash Neo-Noir with a side order of Fried Chicken. ... Who's Left Standing? ... Fearless and zealous Texas noir filmmaking

programme.title: The Winslow Boy
programme.desc: 1948. Drama. Directed by Anthony Asquith. Stars Robert Donat, Cedric Hardwicke & Basil Radford. Pre-WW1 England, a youngster is expelled from a naval academy over a theft. His parents demand a trial

programme.title: Monty Nash
programme.desc: The Long Ride. 1971. Stars Harry Guardino, Armand Alzamora & Carmen Argenziano. Montgomery Nash, an undercover investigator is called in whenever the nation's security is in question (S1, E01)

programme.title: Lilli Marlene
programme.desc: 1950. Drama. Lilli, (Lisa Daniely) the French girl whose song 'Lilli Marlene' is loved by the Germans and the allies alike, is captured by the Nazis and rescued by the British

programme.title: Crimes at the Dark House
programme.desc: 1940. Horror. Director: George King. Stars Tod Slaughter & Sylvia Marriott. A madman kills a man who has just inherited a large estate, then impersonates his victim to gain entrance to the estate

programme.title: BFI: The Man From Nowhere
programme.desc: 1976. Drama. Directed by James Hill. Effective CFF ghost story. A young orphaned girl is sent to live with her uncle, but she is troubled by a shadowy figure that appears and disappears

programme.title: The Tall Headlines
programme.desc: 1952. Thriller. Director: Terence Young. Stars André Morell, Flora Robson & Michael Denison. A family struggles after the eldest son is convicted and hanged for murder. Also stars Mai Zetterling

programme.title: Out of The Fog
programme.desc: 1962. Crime drama directed by Montgomery Tully. An ex-con is the prime suspect when a series of murders occur under a full moon. Every victim is a blonde young woman. Starring David Sumner

programme.title: Hell On Wheels
programme.desc: 1967. Two brothers survive the perils of stock-car racing and a kidnapping. Great music. Stars Marty Robbins & Connie Smith

programme.title: Complex of Fear
programme.desc: Complex of Fear...Complex of Fear...Based on a true story. A serial rapist is at large and no-one is safe in this riveting account of terror. But, for the investigating cop, does the attacker live close to home? (1993) [imdb description: Directed by Brian Grant. With Hart Bochner, Joe Don Baker, Chelsea Field, Brett Cullen. Condominium residents are terrified when they learn that two of their neighbors have been brutally raped and that the culprit may be living in their midst. A police manhunt ensues. One officer, who actually lives in the complex, is particularly troubled, for not only do the incidents cause his wife to admit that she was a victim of date rape, he is also the one who had a chance to kill the rapist...] [imdb description: Directed by Brian Grant. With Hart Bochner, Joe Don Baker, Chelsea Field, Brett Cullen. Condominium residents are terrified when they learn that two of their neighbors have been brutally raped and that the culprit may be living in their midst. A police manhunt ensues. One officer, who actually lives in the complex, is particularly troubled, for not only do the incidents cause his wife to admit that she was a victim of date rape, he is also the one who had a chance to kill the rapist...]
programme.review: Viewers comments : I wore the dress and I had the drinks, but I also said No! ... Routine crime docudrama ... Filmed at My Old Apartment Complex ... Fairly good mystery. ... Handsome Hart Bocher as a cop
